snippet: Patrick Lynch, a former Attorney General from Rhode Island, has worked closely with a group called FairSearch, sending dozens of letters and emails to attorneys general around the United States, since at least 2011, repeating urging them to...
lead_paragraph: Patrick Lynch, a former Attorney General from Rhode Island, has worked closely with a group called FairSearch, sending dozens of letters and emails to attorneys general around the United States, since at least 2011, repeating urging them to investigate Google.

headline.main: Former Attorney General Lynch Calling for Google Investigation
